page.title: 12PUPILS RELIGIOUS BELIEFS
page.content: THIS SURVEY WAS FOR ONE CLASS IN THE FIRST YEAR OF MANOR COMMUNITY COLLEGE. THE QUESTIONNAIRE CONTAINED 4 QUESTIONS ABOUT RELIGION. THE POPULATION OF THE CLASS IS 30 PUPILS. THERE ARE 25 PUPILS WHOSE RELIGION IS CHURCH OF ENGLAND. ONE PUPILS RELIGION IS MUSLIM. THERE ARE ALSO 4 PUPILS WHO HAVE NOT GOT A RELIGION. THERE ARE ONLY 5 PUPILS IN THE CLASS WHO GO TO CHURCH OR CHAPEL ON SUNDAY. SOME OF THE OTHER PUPILS GO SOMETIMES, WHEN THEY FEEL LIKE IT. THE OTHERS DO NOT GO AT ALL. 14 PUPILS BELIEVE IN GOD, 10 PUPILS BELIEVE THERE MAY BE A GOD, BUT AREN'T SURE. ONLY 6 PUPILS DO NOT BELIEVE IN GOD AT ALL. EVERYONE IN THE CLASS HAS BEEN IN A CHURCH AT SOMETIME,USUALLY FOR A CHRISTENING,A WEDDING OR A FUNERAL.
